tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Dr Vishwesh was instrumental in treating a medical condition that I had for more than 3 years. I had visited several hospitals and met several doctors but I could not get relief from my illness. Finally met Dr Vishwesh who diagnosed my issues and initiated a treatment. He also connected me with the right specialist who could cure my illness within a short span of time. I am grateful to his involvement throughout my treatment journey. One thing I liked was he is available whenever I wanted guidance on the phone and helped me to keep my morale high during this time.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
"I wanted to express my sincere appreciation for the outstanding care I received during my recent visits with Dr. Vishwesh Babu Vishnumurthy demonstrated exceptional professionalism, empathy, and expertise throughout my treatment.

During my appointments, Dr. Vishwesh Babu Vishnumurthy took the time to thoroughly explain my condition, treatment options, and answered all my questions in a way that I could easily understand. This level of communication made me feel informed and involved in my healthcare decisions.

Furthermore, Dr. Vishwesh Babu Vishnumurthy â€˜s genuine concern for my well-being was evident, and it greatly eased my anxieties about my medical condition. I felt like more than just a patient; I felt like a valued individual under their care.

The entire experience with Dr. Vishwesh Babu Vishnumurthyâ€˜s practice, from the welcoming staff to the well-organized clinic, further enhanced my overall satisfaction with the care I received.

I believe Dr. Vishwesh commitment to patient care and their dedication to excellence in medicine truly sets them apart. My health has improved significantly thanks to their care, and I am grateful for the exceptional service provided by Dr. Vishwesh. 
Thank you Doctor

review:
From the very first appointment, He was warm and friendly demeanour immediately put me at ease. Dr Vishwesh took the time to actively listen to my concerns, showing genuine empathy and understanding. His ability to communicate complex medical information clearly and concisely ensured that I was well-informed about my condition, treatment options, and potential outcomes. This empowered me to make informed decisions about my health, which greatly contributed to my overall peace of mind.
I recommend Dr Vishwesh.

Heâ€™s also futuristic in preventing the issue from repeating in the future through proper testing. He called me two days later to know how I was doing. Great follow up and great care!!! We are fortunate to have him as our neighborhood doctor.

I went to show a  swelling and pain  that I noticed soon as I got up in the morning. The doctor suspected the virus almost 100%, but wanted to check with his friend dermatologist doctor.  Soon, right in front me he sent the picture on WhatsApp and got an  okay over a follow up phone call. The treatment was started almost immediately. Today is the third day, entering 4th day and I see remarkable progress. 
I feel I am in safe and caring hands.
